e1.description: Everyone can learn to code! Yes, everyone! In this live event, we are going to go through all the key basics and get you started with programming as well.
e1.title: Programming for everyone

e2.description: We know: Networking is no fun if you are an introvert person. That's why we came up with this event - it'll be so much easier. Promised!
e2.title: Networking for introverts
